rev.desc.rev.desc: Added Check to start panel for datatype of groups being passed in and constructed query based on that. Also changed Multiple records selected exit on Select panel to process the record. Added Next panel after mail sent to group to check for other groups and process them until no more then exit the routine.

descript.descript: Added Check to start panel for datatype of groups being passed in and constructed query based on that. Also changed Multiple records selected exit on Select panel to process the record. Added Next panel after mail sent to group to check for other groups and process them until no more then exit the routine.
